articles.image_title: DUESSELDORF, GERMANY - MAY 15: North-Rhine Westphalia Green's top candidate Mona Neubaur reacts at the election party of the Green's following exit polls in North Rhine-Westphalia on May 15, 2022 in Düsseldorf, Germany. The CDU and Germany's rival Social Democrats (SPD) were neck-and-neck in the polls. North Rhine-Westphalia is Germany's most populous state, and analysts see the election as an important indicator of the popularity of the current SPD-led governing coalition under SPD Chancellor Olaf Scholz. (Photo by Thomas Lohnes/Getty Images)

articles.title: Die Befreiung, die gar nicht nötig gewesen wäre
articles.image_title: On May 12, 1975, the Khmer Rouge seized the USS Mayaguez and its crew in Cambodian territorial waters as they were en route to Thailand. The US first launched a rescue mission that ended in disaster after a helicopter crashed. A massive assault was launched on May 14-15 and the majority of the crew were rescued from the island of Koh Tang, but not before both sides had lost over a dozen casualties. The Mayaguez Incident marked the last official US involvement in the Vietnam War. It was the only recorded clash between US forces and the Khmer Rouge.
articles.author: Sven Felix Kellerhoff
